about.title: Developer

about.mainTitle:
I'm Ritesh Rana,
Full Stack Developer & Cloud Architect
from the vibrant lands of India.
about.description: I have rich experience in web development & building scalable applications. Also I am good at React, Node.js, AWS, and modern web technologies. I love to talk with you about our unique approach. Feel free to contact me writing an email with your project idea.

aitools.chatgpt: Utilized for code generation, debugging, and architectural suggestions during development workflows.

experience.title: Experience
experience.subtitle: Where I've Worked
experience.description: Here's a brief rundown of my most recent experiences.

gfy.name: GFY â€“ GoFarmYourself
gfy.desc1: Developed and deployed a cross-platform React Native mobile app using Expo EAS, integrated with optimized build profiles and native components
gfy.desc2: Created a scalable Next.js web application powered by AWS Amplify Gen 2, AppSync (GraphQL APIs), Lambda functions, and DynamoDB
gfy.desc3: Focused on performance and user experience through efficient state management, lazy data loading, native animations, and cloud-based deployment pipelines

bharee.name: Bharee
bharee.desc1: Developed a scalable web application for B2B water purification infrastructure and distribution
bharee.desc2: Built frontend using React JS and SCSS, and backend with Node JS, REST APIs, and MongoDB
bharee.desc3: Ensured responsive UI and seamless module integration

totam.name: Totam
totam.desc1: Developed a multi-tenant web application using the .NET Framework for hiring and interview management
totam.desc2: Implemented features to enhance communication between managers and candidates
totam.desc3: Focused on modular architecture and access control

ementor.name: Ementor
ementor.desc1: Built a cross-platform application for Windows, Android, iOS, and macOS using .NET MAUI Blazor
ementor.desc2: Worked as a full stack developer using .NET MAUI for frontend and Node JS with MongoDB for backend
ementor.desc3: Designed responsive interfaces and optimized database workflows

lusio.name: Lusio
lusio.desc1: Developed a gaming platform interface using Next JS
lusio.desc2: Worked as a frontend developer, focusing on component-based UI and performance

theoceann.name: Theoceann
theoceann.desc1: Maritime-focused project with front-end development using React JS
theoceann.desc2: Development in React JS with Python (Fast-API)

rocketstreets.name: Rocket Streets
rocketstreets.desc1: Developed a stock market-focused web application with dynamic data rendering
rocketstreets.desc2: Worked as a frontend developer using Next JS, focusing on performance and component-based architecture

interntrack.name: InternTrack
interntrack.desc1: Developed the frontend using React.js, ensuring a responsive and intuitive user interface
interntrack.desc2: Designed and implemented a serverless backend on AWS using IAM, EC2, API Gateway, Lambda (Python), DynamoDB, and Amazon Cognito
interntrack.desc3: Supported team in ensuring cross-browser compatibility and enhancing product quality through QA processes

marsdevs.name: MarsDevs Pvt. Ltd
marsdevs.resp1: Spearheaded full-stack development for live web and mobile applications in a collaborative Agile environment
marsdevs.resp2: Built and maintained applications using React JS, React Native, Next JS, Node JS, Python and TypeScript
marsdevs.resp3: Designed and integrated AWS-based serverless architecture using AppSync, Lambda Functions, and related services
marsdevs.resp4: Ensured high code quality through modular coding practices, version control, and performance optimization

eteam.name: Eteam Infoservices Pvt. Ltd
eteam.resp1: Delivered scalable full-stack solutions by leading the design, development, and deployment of enterprise-level applications
eteam.resp2: Utilized React JS, React Native, Next JS, Node JS, Python, and .NET MAUI Blazor for development
eteam.resp3: Designed front-end/back-end architecture and implemented database schemas with clear application flowcharts
eteam.resp4: Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve application performance and code reusability

experiom.name: Experiom Pvt. Ltd
experiom.resp1: Contributed to end-to-end project development and deployment with a focus on full-stack responsibilities
experiom.resp2: Developed automation scripts using Selenium and integrated them with BrowserStack for testing
experiom.resp3: Created Applitools UI test scripts and implemented Amplitude & GTM for analytics and event tracking

overview.title: Overview
overview.content1: This Privacy Policy outlines how Ritesh Rana's personal portfolio website handles information, copyright matters, and usage terms. This is a personal portfolio website designed to showcase my work, skills, and professional experience.
overview.content2: By accessing this website, you acknowledge and agree to the terms outlined in this Privacy Policy.

personalInfo.title: Personal Information
personalInfo.content1: This website does not actively collect or store personal information from visitors. The only personal information displayed is:
personalInfo.item1: My professional contact information (email and phone number)
personalInfo.item3: Links to my professional social media profiles

websiteDesign.title: Website Design
websiteDesign.content: The design of this website is inspired by various sources across the internet. Any resemblance to existing websites is coincidental. The overall implementation and code structure are original work.

images.title: Third-Party Images
images.content1: The following images are sourced from open-source platforms and free resources on the internet:
images.content2: If you have any copyright concerns regarding these images, please contact me at
images.content3: and I will promptly address the issue and replace the content if necessary.

originalContent.title: Original Content
originalContent.content1: The following content is my original work and I claim copyright ownership:
originalContent.item3: My personal display picture (DP) on the About page
originalContent.item4: The brand logo displayed on the homepage (created with AI assistance)

icons.title: Technology Icons
icons.content: All technology and tool icons used on this website are either generated using SVG AI tools or downloaded from open-source platforms. These technologies are open-source and their logos are freely available for use in portfolios and educational contexts.

aiContent.title: AI-Generated Content
aiContent.content1: All translations on this website from English to other languages (including Hindi) have been generated using AI tools. While efforts have been made to ensure accuracy, there may be errors or inaccuracies in the translations.
aiContent.content2: If you notice any translation errors or have concerns about the translated content, please contact me at
aiContent.content4: . I will review and correct any issues promptly. Please note that no legal action can be taken based on AI-generated translation errors.

contactInfo.title: Contact Information Usage
contactInfo.content1: My contact information (email and phone number) is displayed on this website for professional purposes only. Any misuse of this information, including but not limited to spam calls, unauthorized use, or sharing without permission, is strictly prohibited.
contactInfo.content2: I reserve the right to take legal action against any individual or entity that misuses my contact information.

disclaimer.title: General Disclaimer
disclaimer.content: This website and its content are provided for informational and portfolio purposes only. While every effort is made to ensure accuracy, some content (particularly AI-generated translations) may contain errors. No liability is accepted for any inaccuracies or omissions.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For any questions, concerns, or issues related to this Privacy Policy or the website content, please contact:
